issue.title: [Rust] Expose functions to read a CSV StringRecord into a RecordBatch.
issue.body:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11119?focusedCommentId=17565069) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
Is this something to close here and migrate to https://github.com/apache/arrow-rs/issues?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11119?focusedCommentId=17614766) by Apache Arrow JIRA Bot (arrowjira):*
This issue was last updated over 90 days ago, which may be an indication it is no longer being actively worked. To better reflect the current state, the issue is being unassigned per [project policy](https://arrow.apache.org/docs/dev/developers/bug_reports.html#issue-assignment). Please feel free to re-take assignment of the issue if it is being actively worked, or if you plan to start that work soon.
